item.title: Use rclone with OneDrive(Business plan) without Business API access
item.description: Hi there ðŸ‘‹ Let’s say you have to share a report that you’re generating programatically with a consultant in your company every week. Your general approach might be to upload it to your organization’s document/file storage platform(e.g OneDrive) and share it. If you’ve to do this multiple times, it’s boring to perform the same steps over and over again! What about automating this process? As soon as your report is generated you can run a command that will copy your file present in local to OneDrive server.
